article: When I was just a kid of ten , my father said to me , " Come here and take a lesson from the lovely lemon tree . Do n ' t put your faith in love , my boy . " My father said to me , " I fear you ' ll find that love is like the lovely lemon tree . " Lemon tree very pretty , and the lemon flower is sweet , but the fruit of the poor lemon is impossible to eat . beneath the lemon tree One day my love and I did lie . A girl so sweet that when she smiled , the stars rose in the sky . We passed that summer lost in love beneath the lemon tree . The music of her laughter hid my father ' s words from me . Lemon tree very pretty , and the lemon flower is sweet , but the fruit of the poor lemon is impossible to eat . One day she left without a word , she took away the sun . And in the dark she ' d left behind , I knew what she had done . She left me for another ; it ' s a common tale but true . A sadder man but wiser now , I sing these words to you . Lemon tree very pretty , and the lemon flower is sweet , but the fruit of the poor lemon is impossible to eat . Lemon tree , Lemon tree , Lemon tree , Lemon tree
questions: " The music of her laughter hid my father ' s words from me . " means

model: the boy ' s father did n ' t like the music of the dessert .
the boy forgot his father ' s suggestion .
the boy lost his father ' s words from her
human: The girl told the boy that his father was not right .
The boy should n ' t stay with the girl beneath the lemon tree .
The boy forgot his father ' s suggestion .
